Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to convert Quest files into external or HTML files?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to convert Quest files into external or HTML files?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi there, see if this helps

http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/questkit/topic/g0va_cmesusa4lv6hkg0ia/publishing-on-itch-io
Not helpful. Is there a website where I can CONVERT these files?
Posts.HTML: Not helpful. Is there a website where I can CONVERT these files?

Posts.EditableText:
No, there is not.

Pigbeetle's link is for QuestJS, which already is an HTML page (plus library files).

You could consider converting to QuestJS, and there is software that will help with that, but you will still need to do some stuff yourself, which would refer knowing at least some QuestJS.

https://github.com/ThePix/QuestJS/wiki/Converting-from-Quest-5
Posts.HTML:
